snippet.title: Medievil 2 - intro
snippet.description:
Medievil sir dan fortesque is brought back to life by his arch enemy a sorcerer who has brainwashed the peasants and commands the dead.
Medievil 2, you fight off a madman whom has obtained the books of spells from the previous antagonist, sir dan fortesque is unexpectedly brought back to life again to fight evil once more.
